paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR gene variants, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Progressive painful symmetric peripheral neuropathy, complete heart block, and sensorineural hearing loss.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 45-year-old female presented with history of deafness for 5 years and progressively increasing burning pain and paresthesia in both lower limbs followed by the upper limbs for the past 1 year.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with familial amyloid neuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: The patient has a positive family history; her brother had similar symptoms and died of cardiac arrest.
variants.additional_notes: This is the first report of p.Lys55Asn mutation in TTR gene reported from India.
key_quotes: This mutation has not been reported from India.
This is the first report of p. Lys55Asn mutation in TTR gene reported from India.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
